Gaps: limited explicit, named experience in cloud infrastructure/edge networking/distributed systems and security (Fastly priorities), limited explicit evidence of developer-/engineer-focused product adoption (APIs/SDKs, developer growth metrics), and unclear scope over Product Marketing/Documentation/Product Operations functions and direct ARR/infrastructure P&L responsibility for large enterprise infra products.

Questions: For your most recent CPO/GM role at Move Inc, what was the ARR or annual revenue you owned and the specific P&L scope (e.g., ARR, gross margin targets)?

Do you have direct product ownership or delivery experience for infrastructure, networking, edge, or distributed systems products? If yes, provide 1–2 examples (product names, buyer personas like SRE/DevOps) — yes/no + short details.
Across your CPO/EVP roles, how many direct reports in Product Management, Product Marketing, Design, Documentation, and Product Operations did you have (per function or total headcount)?
Can you share any developer- or API-focused metrics you owned (e.g., active developers, API calls/month, developer retention, SDK adoption)? If yes, give 1–2 metrics.

For pricing/monetization work (JAXTR, Move, FNGN), did you lead formal pricing optimization exercises (A/B tests, value-based pricing) and what measurable outcome (relative change) resulted? yes/no + short detail.
